title: Bee Gun
summaries: The Bee Gun is a pre-Hardmode magic weapon that ordinarily fires 1-3 (1-6 with a Hive Pack(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) equipped) piercing bee projectiles per shot, with two independent 1/6 (16.67%) chances to fire an extra bee. The bees deal 100% of the weapon's base damage (9 base damage) and have a 1/2 (50%) chance to deal 1 extra damage. Bee projectiles home in on their closest target and pierce an unlimited number of enemies before dissipating after a 10-second duration, after ricocheting off solid blocks three separate times, or immediately upon contact with water or lava. The Bee Gun has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance of being dropped by the Queen Bee.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Mythical.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Its best modifier is Demonic or Deadly for damage output, or Mystic for mana conservation because it cannot get modifiers that affect knockback.

statistics.Knockback: 0.25 (Extremely weak) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 0 (No knockback) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Tooltip: Shoots bees that will chase your enemy
